option.name: notice
option.value:
WeatherLog is an app for logging air temperature changes and calculating total time of preset limits exceeding in the nearest past. The project began as a way to help moto-bikers decide if it is safe to drive in the morning after cold night, or for automobile owners to decide if it is time to change tires to/from winter ones. It also may be useful when man thinks about clothes/shoes to dress in this time, or in all other cases when there needs to analyze temperature's behaviour.
